title: The first general epistle of St. John the Apostle, unfolded and applied the first part in two and twenty lectures on the first chapter, and two verses of the second : delivered in St. Dyonis. Back-Church, An. Dom. 1654 / by Nath. Hardy ...
author: Hardy, Nathaniel, 1618-1670.
publisher: Printed by E. Tyler for Nathanael Webb and William Grantham ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
